people.name: Randy Bresnik
people.title: Commander
people.bio: Randy is a Marine and pilot from Fort Knox, Kentucky. This is his second trip to space and last time, his wife gave birth while he was in orbit. He is also the first Citadel graduate to go to space.

people.name: Sergey Ryazansky
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Sergey was born in Moscow, Russia. He began his career as a biochemist before becoming a cosmonaut. Fun family fact: His grandfather helped design the guidance systems on Sptnik!

people.name: Paolo Nespoli
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Paolo hails from Verano Brianza, in northern Italy. He is a man of many hobbies: pilot, scuba diver, photographer. He is also a... wait for it... master parachutist.

people.name: Mark Vande Hei
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: This is Markâ€™s first time in space! Most his career has been in the US Army before beginning at NASA in 2014. He was born in Virginia.

people.name: Joseph Acaba
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: As a child, Joseph was inspired by video of Neil Armstrongâ€™s moon landing. So inspired he grew up to be the first Puerto Rican in space!  He is an avid scuba diver and loves science fiction.

people.name: Alexander Misurkin
people.title: Flight Engineer
people.bio: Alexander is a life long pilot and a Major in the Russian Air Force. This is his second trip to the International Space station
